tasks.label: Build All
tasks.command: npm run build:shared && npm run build:cli && npm run build:web

tasks.label: Build CLI
tasks.command: npm run build:shared && npm run build:cli

tasks.label: Build Web
tasks.command: npm run build:shared && npm run build:web

tasks.label: Publish Shared
tasks.command: cd packages/shared && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run build && npm publish --access public

tasks.label: Publish CLI
tasks.command: npm run build:shared && cd packages/cli && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run build && npm publish

tasks.label: Publish All
tasks.command: cd packages/shared && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run build && npm publish --access public && cd ../cli && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run build && npm publish
